title: Sun Platinum
description:
Provided a full branding service through creating a business card, invitation card, web design, photo shooting and web development for the Tokyo based hair salon
Developed using SPA with Ajax load and elaborated animations to not lose the “suave” feeling
The whole website running seamlessly without a pagination
skillsets: Photoshop, Illustrator, Kiev 88, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Ajax, Instagram API
